name: Athletics - World Championship
description:
Players from all over the world have already experienced the exciting life of a professional athlete. It is time you joined the other players in the unique game of its kind. In Athletics - World Challenge you can even compete against real athletes in competitions.
Competitions:
- 100 metre sprint
- javelin throw
- long jump
- hurdles
- triple jump
- discus
- 400m
- hammer throw
- shot put
- high jump
- pole vault
- 1500m
- Decathlon

5 competitions
Players Matches
Golden Cup
Nations Cup
Survival Contest
Team Cup

Challenge people around the world and see how well you perform compared to others from your country and globally.
Chat with other athletes and play in Teams
Collect coins for winning, and use these to buy stars to upgrade your athlete.
Have fun!
Defeat opponents and climb to the top of the rankings
Test your skills in tournaments
